alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN GULF AND SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 320 PM EDT/220 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Port St. Joe, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Nine Mile, Highland View, Eleven Mile, St Joseph State Park, Thirteen Mile, Odena, Indian Pass, Tilton, Jones Homestead, Ward Ridge, White City, Milltown, Simmons Bayou, Beacon Hill, Saint Joe Beach, and Overstreet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf
